TopicTitle: Boop, Boop, Boop, Beeeep audio required

Articles.Content:
1. I love the traffic light graphics for manoeuvre mode count downs but, would really like an audio cue as well. I believe the title provides ample articulation of the desired outcome.
  2. The Blue "arrow" button to the left of the green go window (bottom right corner of VAB) could do with some elaboration. I suggest a delta V logo, i (information) logo or condensed equation looking design type of thing.
  3. Anyone who bought KSP2 within 24 hours of launch should get elevated status! A gold plaque, statue or honorific title (KSPEA Founder) but a badge for flight suit would suffice.
  4. If any or all for these suggestions are accepted I will expect full reward in multiple GBPs or my name in lights. One of either, both would be too ostentatious!
